resources.string:
To use this app, log onto Geocaching.com and download your found log. When launched, you can select the log file (ZIP and GPX supported) which will be parsed and a calendar displayed, showing when you need to look for a cache.

 This help screen is only shown at first launch. To see again, select 'help' from the calander screen.

 Still to come:
 • Add notifications
 • Add countdown widget


 Press back to get back.
Remove this day from the list?
You need to find a cache on %1$d days.
